casebody.data:
UNITED STATES, as Owner of the American Steamship ISSAQUEENA, Libelant-Appellant, v. Christian LILLELUND and Christian Guldager, Respondents, and National Surety Company, Respondent-Appellee. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit March 19, 1928. No. 218. Charles H. Tuttle, U. S. Atty., of New York City (H. F. Birnbaum, Sp. Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for the United States. Burlingham, Veeder, Masten & Fearey, of New York City (John L. Galey, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee National Surety Co.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
